name: BROWN Cap
description: Laundered 100% cotton twill. Slide buckle adjustable fabric strap, end tucks away. Low profile, unstructured. Import. Embroidery. Brown.

name: 24oz Contour Water Bottle
description: Contoured, BPA-free polyethylene plastic with textured grip. Polypropylene lid with flip drink spout; wide mouth opening. Imprint.

name: America Flag Tee - S
description: 4.2 oz, 99% airlume combed and ringspun cotton/1% polyester with gray flecks of heather pulled through base color. Shoulder-to-shoulder taping. Side seams. Tearaway label. Retail fit. Unisex sizing. Imprint.
